Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Exempts from the mortgage recording tax mortgages executed by a veteran first time homebuyer
Summary: Exempts from the mortgage recording tax mortgages executed by a veteran first time homebuyer.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting from the mortgage recording tax mortgages executed by a veteran first time homebuyer
